content: crochet picot peaks doily - use this pretty doily on your tables or your walls it s a small and simple project you can take with you anywhere it looks just as good whether it is crocheted it in one colour or several the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 10 inch diameter level intermediate copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/picot-peaks-crochet-doily/
